# 2024

### spatialDLPFC

![](posts/2024-05-23-spatialDLPFC/images/SpatialDLPFC_logo.png){width="172"}

**A data-driven single cell and spatial transcriptomic map of the human prefrontal cortex**

-   DOI: <https://doi.org/10.1126/science.adh1938>

-   Pre-printed 2/15/2023, DOI: [10.1101/2023.02.15.528722](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.02.15.528722v1)

-   Exciting new work on spatial transcritomics & snRNA-seq in the human DLPFC!

-   Explore this data at [research.libd.org/spatialDLPFC/](https://research.libd.org/spatialDLPFC/)

-   [Tweetorial](https://twitter.com/lahuuki/status/1626686409313763328?s=20)

### Deconvolution Benchmark

![](images/DeconvoBuddies.png){width="87"}

**Benchmark of cellular deconvolution methods using a multi-assay reference dataset from postmortem human prefrontal cortex**

-   Pre-printed 4/7/2024, DOI: <https://doi.org/10.1101/2024.02.09.579665>

-   Software tools and data available through R Package [DeconvoBuddies](https://research.libd.org/DeconvoBuddies/)

-   [Tweetorial](https://x.com/lahuuki/status/1779902215328608480)

# 2023

### TREG

![](images/TREG_hex.png){width="100"}

**Data-driven identification of total RNA expression genes for estimation of RNA abundance in heterogeneous cell types highlighted in brain tissue**

-   DOI: [10.1186/s13059-023-03066-w](https://genomebiology.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s13059-023-03066-w#article-info)

-   Pre-print DOI: [10.1101/2022.04.28.489923](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2022.04.28.489923v1)

-   My **first first-author paper** is now in published by Genome Biology! This pairs with my **first Bioconductor R package** [TREG](https://bioconductor.org/packages/TREG)

You can find my full publications list on [ORCiD](https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5148-3602) or [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=GGJIfVYAAAAJ&hl=en)
